html: crown of glory/a royal diadem in the hand of thy God. Zion and her people, as heirs of God, will add to God's glory by their great righteousness (Moses 1:39). A similar prophecy is found in latter-day scripture. Concerning the return of the lost tribes of Israel, the Lord said, "They [shall] fall down and be crowned with glory, even in Zion, by the hands of the servants of the Lord" (D&C 133:32; see D&C 60:4).
